title: I need help
body: I wanted to submit a support ticket but i need to sign in and i don't remember the password for the email i used last time, what do i do? Can i just transfer it to a different email?

replies.body: No worries if you can't access the ticket center, you can also send us an email via support@riotgames.com.  You'll be able to correspond with us through email replies that way!  We'll also be able to help you out with updating your email.  We'll reach out as soon as we can!
